lead_paragraph: A judge reached no decision on whether to grant bail to the former officer, Michael Slager, who is charged in the shooting death of Walter Scott.

headline.main: South Carolina: Ruling Delayed on Bail for Ex-Officer
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Ruling Delayed On Bail For Ex-Officer

snippet: A judge reached no decision on whether to grant bail to the former officer, Michael Slager, who is charged in the shooting death of Walter Scott.
